abstract: Gotham Extra: If the City Council passes a so-called living wage law over the mayor's objections, the speaker and mayor should empower an ideologically balanced panel to examine the law's effects.
snippet: Gotham Extra: If the City Council passes a so-called living wage law over the mayor's objections, the speaker and mayor should empower an ideologically balanced panel to examine the law's effects.
lead_paragraph: Long ago, I passed boiling summers driving taxis in New York City (an experience that no doubt still summons nightmares for my former passengers, not to mention wayward pedestrians). Other summers, I worked as a doorman, hauling bags and opening doors for royally snooty Park Avenue dowagers.

headline.main: In Living Wage Talks, Warfare Trumps Discourse
